name: Serve My Dreams
description: This image is inspired by a beautiful article written by Jason Fagone in the San Francisco Chronicle. The pertinent quote is: "No one knows what awaits us when we die, but there was a lovely logic to the idea that if restaurants do exist there, ghost waitresses will serve our memories." My childhood consisted of city walks in the park on freezing Minneapolis nights. As I grew older, these ventures were accompanied by streetlights, benches, and my future wife. The memory is beautiful; but alas, no more, and eventually the ghost will take it away...
